name: TXP_MELD_PELD_EX_AUD
description: This table extracts the related multiple-response Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD)/Pediatric End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD) Exceptions Audit Info (I HSB 30411) item.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MELDPELD_EX_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the audit information for Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD), Pediatric Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD), and liver status exceptions for the transplant episode.
